headline: Trump, Fed, Russia and more: BCA offers 5 tactical views
summary: Investing.com -- BCA Research has set out five tactical calls based on recent political and geopolitical developments, saying investors should “long USD, overweight US versus Europe, overweight Europe versus China, and short oil.”
